channel.title: Making an npc wander?
channel.description:
I'm running a server and I'm trying to create new areas for the players, but i've been having an issue.
I want the npc's to walk around the area, like the npc Larry(1780).
Does it have to do with the autospawn.cgf, or is it just the npc itself?
If you know how to fix this, please answer!
Much obliged!

item.title: Making an npc wander?
item.dc:creator: @Hoangphan Hoangphan
item.description:
@Hoangphan wrote:

They still don’t seem to move on there own… Thanks though!

Read full topic

item.title: Making an npc wander?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Autospawn configuration file. RangeX1; RangeY1; RangeX2; RangeY2.

Read full topic
